index.title: Vanguard Student Housing - Where everything begins
index.description: Come experience the authentic coliving for university students.

rooms.title: Stay in our shared apartments in the best areas
rooms.description: Living in the most central areas, with all the comforts and various services included. Amazing, right?

flats.title: Live your way with our full apartments in the best areas
flats.description: Choose how, when, and in what way you want to live with a stunning apartment all to yourself in the most cosmopolitan and cool city.

residences.title: Enjoy the university experience in our student accommodations
residences.description: Live one of the best times of your life to the fullest. We take care of everything else.

about.title: Meet our amazing team!
about.description: Would you like to join the Vanguard Student Housing team or find out who's behind all this? Welcome!

advantages.title: Collaborate with Vanguard Student Housing.

blog.title: Stay informed about everything that happens at Vanguard Student Housing.
